1.1.1.name: wordpress/wp-task-manager
1.1.1.description:
Wp-Task-Manager is a plugin for wordpress which add a small task manager inside the administration panel. You can add task to your self or to the other contributor of the blog.

Here is a list of functions :

  • Dashboard Widget to quickly see your task
  • Page to see all the tasks : yours but the other one too
  • Create a task for you or for the other participant
  • give access permission of your users
  • comment and discuss about each task

You can see the plugin in action on video on the official page.

This plugin doesn't work with Wordpress MU.
